title: Remove upper section from bill receipt, keep 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' and below

requirements.text: Remove all content above the 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' text in the printed bill receipt, keeping only the 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' line and everything below it

quotes: i want only the from varshini classic cusine and the down part of it. delete the upper part of it

acceptanceCriteria: The printed bill shows 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' as the topmost element
All content that previously appeared above 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' is removed
All content below 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' remains intact and functional

constraints: Do not modify the bill calculation logic or data structure
Maintain all existing print functionality below the 'From Varshini Classic Cuisine' line
nonGoals: Changing the receipt style or formatting of remaining content
Modifying the backend bill storage or retrieval logic
